lead_paragraph: Zeljko Krajan, Croatia's Davis Cup captain, says veteran Ivo Karlovic will return in the final against Argentina.

headline.print_headline: Karlovic Returns to Davis Cup for Finals Against Argentina
headline.main: Karlovic Returns to Davis Cup for Finals Against Argentina
